name: Server Defense
description:
You are a SysAdmin. Unfortunately, your system is riddled with bugs and being attacked by trojan horses, phishing attacks, and viruses.
Towers are on the bottom, and the panel on the side displays the tower's properties and allows you to upgrade them.
The attacks come from the ethernet port (I know, you haven't used one in over a decade).
You're responsible for this server. Keep it alive.
